text:
@Jim_Jordan @realDonaldTrump Ohio has 30,000+ cases of covid-19.

What are YOU doing to help your fellow Ohioans battles this pandemic? 

As far as we can see, the answer is - NOTHING. 

https://t.co/8J1BBs8cJW
